name: stateroom
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large room, for example in a castle or palace, used for formal or important occasions: the staterooms at Windsor Castle
a room where you sleep on a cruise ship (= a large ship like a hotel): The prize is an inside stateroom on a 7-night cruise.
